channel.title: Allow cw (and possibly other classes) use their day ability on trial
channel.description:
I think cw should be able to use their day abilities on trial,
There is nothing more frustrated from getting converted to a loss that are responsible for, And bd should have a way to deal with just convert any invest class,
The new cw day ability should be used when you know who is that invest class, but you don't have time to figure it out because once trial started, it's too late.
Also, I don't get why any ability that doesnt prove yourself should be limited on trial, Trial is somtimes 80% of the day.
